search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for AFrame (aframesoftware.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for AFrame Software can be found at: [https://www.aframesoftware.com/pricing](https://www.aframesoftware.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: brand-aframesoftwares-header](https://www.aframesoftware.com/wp-content/themes/aframesoftware/img/brand-aframesoftwares-header.png)](https://www.aframesoftware.com/ "AFrameSoftware")

![Image 2: icon-dollar-sign-white](https://www.aframesoftware.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/icon-dollar-sign-white.png)

Keeping it simple.

$54 per user

*   Free 30 Day Trial
*   Monthly Subscription
*   **Unlimited Transactions**
*   **Unlimited Managed Agents**
*   **Unlimited Storage**
*   Cancel Anytime

Features

*   Robust Transaction Management
*   Powerful CRM
*   Pre-built Action Plans /  
    Email Templates
*   Email/Calendar Integration
*   Client Portals
*   Fast Support
*   And so much more…

What Our Clients Say
--------------------

As with any new system or tool, getting it up and running can be a painful process. The AFrame staff personally helped me get my data imported correctly, and their initial tutorial made the process a breeze.

Jonathan Thayer

Agent (Compass)

Its a valuable tool to help us run our business rather than feeling like our business is running us.

Clay Smiley

Agent (Compass)

When you are helping multiple agents at a time and working on multiple transactions all at once, AFrame makes sure we don't drop the ball!

Marisa Stockwood

Transaction Coordinator (Compass)

AFrame is a unique platform different from the rest.  It has helped me manage tasks and manage my team pipeline so i can make important decisions in my business.

Nathan Petrosian

Agent (Realty One Group)

It’s super user friendly and intuitive and has made such a difference in our ability to keep organized with our past and current files and access info quickly and easily.

Chad Hauer

Managing Broker (Keller Williams)

We have 3 agents & 2 assistants closing consistently 100+ transactions per year. Before AFrame, we tried several other real estate solutions, but all were lacking in some way. AFrame is finally a tool that does everything we need. There is absolutely no better real estate solution available.

Tim Moldenhauer

Agent (Re/Max)

AFrame has been a game changer. Our processes are more streamlined and it is saving us precious time!

Nikki Forrest

Transaction Coordinator (Integrity Homeselling Team)

Our team has tried several CRM's, and AFrame is the most user-friendly and comprehensive.

Ann Stewart

Transaction Coordinator (Compass)

It is my personal secretary telling me daily what my tasks are and what I have coming up. With how busy this office is, I can’t imagine life without it. Anyone who doesn’t use it---is not utilizing their time efficiently.

Molly Heinold

Transaction Coordinator (Coldwell Banker)

Not only is the support and customer service refreshingly timely and helpful, the usability is the best I’ve found.

Kelli Macatee

Agent (Compass)

It's the backbone of my business.

Carmen DiPenti

Agent (Compass)

Literally once a month we get an email from one of our clients thanking us for our professional and consistent communication. AFrame is the one tool that finally helps us ensure outstanding customer service. I'm not sure how we managed without for all these years.

Ryan Streiff

Agent (Dave Perry-Miller Real Estate)

Hands down, we would recommend over other platforms on the market - there just isn't a better value out there.

Jeremy Vallery-Watson

Transaction Coordinator (Blue Transaction Services)

AFrame has made my job so much easier and smoother. I work with a team of 9 and we all LOVE it!

Jackie Smith

Transaction Coordinator (Keller Williams)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is based on a per-user monthly subscription model with unlimited usage features.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Monthly subscription per user with unlimited features.
